A LOT of homework. almost 300 questions every 3 weeks. (i recommend mathlab instead of textbook)

comments: Mr. Saedi constantly calls students out during class to help him solve problems on the board so really need to pay attention and stay focused. Had about 150 questions for homework due every few days so had to stay on track with that. He also might time exams so you have to be able to do correct math at a good pace.

comments: I had Isaac for MAT 92 and has been a sub for my MAT 122 class. He was professional, thorough and I really enjoyed that he asked the students to participate when reviewing homework and would help get the right answer by guiding us through the process. Recommended to "practice, practice, practice". As a sub, he helped with clarifying the work.
